attributes.action: Stop Nick Clegg being made a knight of the realm
attributes.background:
Stop Nickname clegg being honoured by the Queen and becoming a Knight of the realm.  
This MP has lied many times during his time as a politician including Tuition Fees and again and again denying that there will be an EU army to replace NATO which has protected the U.K. Since the Second World War.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
